name: TaxiPal
overview:
TaxiPal is the award-winning mobile LBS solution for the taxi industry.

It is the first multi-lingual taxi ordering and brokering service, running on all popular mobile device platforms, initially with EU coverage that will change how taxis are ordered.

TaxiPal was the Grand Prize winner at NAVTEQ Global LBS Challenge Americas region and won the overall NAVTEQ Global LBS Challenge Champion title. TaxiPal won the Mobile Premier Award in Innovation from MobileMonday community at Mobile World Congress 2010.

Benefits to users:

  • All taxi companies at your service
  • Avoid language / alphabet barriers
  • Know your best route and distancein advance, avoid fraud
  • Get the best priced offer
  • Receive hot offers in the area

Benefits to taxi companies:

  • Better availability and visibility to potential clients
  • Optimize the fleet management
  • Make more competitive offers
  • Get more clients
  • Receive direct client feedback
